description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Failed"}) or vector(0) +
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"}) or vector(0) +
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Unknown"}) or vector(0) +
sum(kube_pod_container_status_waiting) or vector(0)

title: Kubernetes cluster monitoring (via Prometheus)
